parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.26

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Deletes given control. The control has to be created either by script with [[ctrlCreate]] or to have <tt>deletable</tt> property in config set to [[true]]. Use [[ctrlShow]] [[false]] and [[ctrlEnable]] [[false]] to disable controls that cannot be deleted. Returns [[Boolean]] indicating  whether the deletion was successful.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlDelete''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlDelete]] (([[findDisplay]] 20000) [[displayCtrl]] 20001);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]
</value></part></template></root>
